attributes.action: Stop the planned withdrawal of the 558 bus service in Newquay Cornwall
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The 558 Newquay Town Centre bus service is operated by Western Greyhound. This operator plans to withdraw this vital community transport service because it says its vehicles are being damaged by some inappropriate speed humps on a stretch of road. Cornwall County, Restormel Borough and Newquay Town Councils have all refused to accept any responsibility.  Help us to out to stop the withdrawal of this service, it is used by many elderly people and they have no other means of getting to the shops or town.
